attributes.action: Expedite UC claims & scrap the 5 wk wait for those affected by COVID-19
attributes.additional_details:
We are in a state of National emergency. People have already lost their jobs or had their hours cut as a direct result of the virus outbreak.

These measures would give a lifeline to the most vulnerable in our society, who otherwise face having to make choices between the most fundamental expenses such as utilities or food.
attributes.background: We ask the Government to expedite Universal Credit claims and dispense with the 5 week wait for those affected by COVID-19.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300980

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
